categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic ranks

nodes.text: A clone major was a rank that could be held by clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic. Majors were able to serve in the Grand Army's HAVw A6 Juggernauts.
Clone majors were first mentioned and pictured in the 2018 release of Star Wars: Complete Vehicles, an updated canon version of the previously released 2013 Star Wars Legends edition.
